title: How and where to enter services received under RCM from the central government in GST? Can anyone clarify? - Quora
tags: Goods and Services Tax in India

response.answer_text: If the question relates to where to show GST paid under RCM in GST return then - GST paid under RCM is shown under GST 3B - as supply attracting GST under RCM. Such transaction will not be reported by the recipient in GSTR 1. It will be reported by the supplier in their GSTR 1 with option ticked as supply attracting RCM. The GST available as ITC will be visible under your GSTR 2A. Please correct if this is not the explanation sought.
